website_summaries.verdict: A basic, no-frills design that will provide hours of fun on the water.
pros: Seats up to three adults and two kids
Most comfortable for up to three people
Pedal positions for one, two, or three people
Rugged UV-stabilized Fortiflex high-density polyethylene deck and hull
cons: Consider removing from water and tipping up when not in use or making cover more secure

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product for the price. Love spending time on our lake. Built in cooler is a must for anybody that enjoys a cold beverage. on the water. Quality product and I would recommend this product to anybody looking for a pedal boat.
customer_reviews.author: TIM WYROBECK

customer_reviews.title: This boat is really fun. I took off one star due to the ...
customer_reviews.text: This boat is really fun. I took off one star due to the limited leg room. It is difficult for a taller person to sit and/or peddle.
customer_reviews.author: daphne muehlendorf

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this while we lived on the lake. We enjoyed it while we were living there. It is a good exercise and you can see things so much more clearly in the lake when you are that close to the surface.
customer_reviews.author: WMD0926

customer_reviews.title: The boat is excellent. But the cover I ordered for it is ...
customer_reviews.text: The boat is excellent. But the cover I ordered for it is light and flimsy and easily blows off in a light wind. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Nail

customer_reviews.title: Love this paddle boat!
customer_reviews.text: The price was amazing, having previously had a 3 person for more than this, different brand, absolutely no different, even the dog loves riding in it!
customer_reviews.author: barby153

customer_reviews.title: Came with a hole in the bottom (looked like a forklift caused it)
customer_reviews.text: Came with a hole in the bottom (looked like a forklift caused it), and the pedal boat itself was fairly dirty. It also cam with scratches on the top of the seat. Fairly disappointing. To be fair the seller came and picked it up reasonably quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great  for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Great little paddle boat. and the price is right. We live on a lake and I have really enjoyed this product easy to drive and very roomy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer love to read

customer_reviews.title: Footwells deformed
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with their quality control as the front footwells on both sides are not flat but rather bulged up. I've caught the heal of my shoe already a few times while pedaling since there is less clearance between the pedals and floor.
customer_reviews.author: fizzxman

customer_reviews.title: Fills up with water inside the boat even with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Fills up with water inside the boat even with the cover on, the cover itself lasted a year, but we have had a BLAST in it.. delivery was a joke i had to DRAG it UP my driveway... the delivery guy couldn't even walk..
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible. 1st boat had a hole from a forklift in the bottom...perfect for sinking enjoyment. We didn't use it but I can see it being submarine worthy, I'm sure. The 2nd showed up scratched and dented all over with grease marks as well. Mom cleaned as much as she could. Then one set of pedals broke on first use, so it's perfect for stationary, pathetic floating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: So much fun. Better with 2 adults and 2 or 3 children - I don't know if I'd put 4 adults on it.
customer_reviews.author: JK, RT

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 trip out so far...but so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! It's a great little cruiser for our neighborhood pond. Lightweight, stable in the water, and easy to pedal and steer. The squeaky rudder mechanism would be my only minor criticism, but I'm sure I can grease the right spots and make it go away.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lake craft for adults and children
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect craft for both adults and children for use on our small lake (1 mile in length). I can't wait for the grandchildren to arrive and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Leahy

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Been using for a month. Simple design easy maintenance, sturdy parts, very easy to steer, works great in shallow waters (our pond is very shallow and the only places we get stuck are places so shallow I can kick ourselves back off with my boot without getting my leg wet). It fits our whole family very comfortably, yet my seven year old can maneuver it alone. And its a nice dry trip. And I shopped around- price can't be beat!
customer_reviews.author: 1101rachel

customer_reviews.title: questionable
customer_reviews.text: first one had big hole in it replaced ok hard to imagine more than 2 people in it poor pedal power and poor steering good to just float in price ok but i wouldnt buy again
customer_reviews.author: Glenn H.

customer_reviews.title: Still Waiting For Deliverly
customer_reviews.text: We have been waiting for over a month for the delivery of this item. It's keeps being delayed without any explanation. It is a Christmas present and I would like to know if it is being delivered by then. Or for that matter- at all.
customer_reviews.author: PSmith

customer_reviews.title: Great little boat!!
customer_reviews.text: Found this at a retailer, but same pedal boat. I love it! Very easy to pedal. Very light to actually pick up and move to the house. Feels very sturdy in spite of light weight. Plenty of room for at least 3 large adults (me and 2 grown sons had a blast!) 5 person would probably include a couple of small children. The canopy that came on mine was a life saver, though. Made it very comfortable to ride in the middle of a 90 deg. day. Great fun on our small lake.
customer_reviews.author: jfk3

product_meta.title: Sun Dolphin 5 Seat Pedal Boat
product_meta.description:
The Sun Dolphin 5 Seat Pedal Boat comfortably seats three adults and two children with pedal positions for 1, 2, or 3 people. The deck and hull of this 5-seat pedal boat are crafted of rugged UV-stabilized Fortiflex high-density polyethylene. The Sun Dolphin pedal boat features dual rear coolers or storage compartments, a built-in extra storage area and beverage holders to make your ride smooth and pleasant..


***Important information when placing your order***


Please verify address and telephone# are accurate. The carriers will contact the phone number on the order to set up a delivery appointment. If this information is inaccurate, there is a possibility that your order will be delayed or cancelled with a possible fee incurred at the sellers discretion.



AMAZON.COM
Float your cares away with the Sun Dolphin pedal boat from KL Industries, which offers room for five with three seats in the front and two in the back. Constructed with a rugged, UV-stabilized Fortiflex polyethylene deck and hull, the boat also features an aluminum tiller steering system and a durable polycarbonate paddle wheel. A built-in cooler allows you to bring along your favorite beverage or act as storage areas to hold extra gear. Other features include built-in motor mount, fishing rod holders, protective vinyl rubrail and mooring cleat, and three-position cranks for easy one-, two- or three-person. It's backed by a 5-year warranty on the deck and hull, and 2 years for parts. Made in USA. 

 



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Sun Dolphin is the most popular size pedal boat. It's a true five seat pedal boat. It accomodates 1,2, or 3 pedal positions so the boat always remains in proper balance to optimize performance. It features exceptional seating comfort with high back rests.

See more
feature_bullets: Comfortably seats three adults and two children
Rugged UV-stabilized Fortiflex High Density Polyethylene deck and hull
***IMPORTANT – phone number is needed to schedule a delivery appointment***
